Class EnhancementOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.nlp.trees.ud.EnhancementOptions

  • public class EnhancementOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Options for enhancing a basic dependency tree.
    Author:
    Sebastian Schuster

    • Constructor Detail

      • EnhancementOptions

        public EnhancementOptions(boolean processMultiWordPrepositions,
                          boolean enhancePrepositionalModifiers,
                          boolean enhanceOnlyNmods,
                          boolean enhanceConjuncts,
                          boolean propagateDependents,
                          boolean addReferent,
                          boolean addCopyNodes,
                          boolean demoteQuantMod,
                          boolean addXSubj)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        processMultiWordPrepositions - Turn multi-word prepositions into flat MWE.
        enhancePrepositionalModifiers - Add prepositions to relation labels.
        enhanceOnlyNmods - Add prepositions only to nmod labels (and not to acl or advcl).
        enhanceConjuncts - Add coordinating conjunctions to relation labels.
        propagateDependents - Propagate dependents.
        addReferent - Add "referent" relation in relative clauses.
        addCopyNodes - Add copy nodes for conjoined Ps and PPs.
        demoteQuantMod - Turn quantificational modifiers into flat multi-word expressions.
        addXSubj - Add relation between controlling subject and controlled verb.

      • EnhancementOptions

        public EnhancementOptions(EnhancementOptions options)
